content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. My name is Jamie, your virtual assistant. Can I get your name to help you schedule your plumbing appointment?
Hi Jamie! It’s Lisa. I need help with a leaking kitchen sink.
Thank you, Lisa! Could you please provide your address so we can confirm service availability in your area?
Sure, I’m at 845 Westview Rd, Pine Valley.
Thank you, Lisa! Let me check if Pine Valley is in our service area.

I'm sorry, Lisa, but it looks like Pine Valley is currently outside of our service area. Unfortunately, we aren’t able to schedule an appointment at this time. If you move closer or have another address, please let us know!
